fields.name: collateral
docs: The mint address for the collateral type this pool supports

fields.name: collateral_vault
docs: The token account address for holding the collateral (target currency) of this long pool

fields.name: currency
docs: The mint address for the currency type this pool supports

fields.name: currency_vault
docs: The token account address for holding the currency, which will be swapped.

fields.name: is_long_pool
docs: Flag to determine if it's a long or short pool

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this PDA

fields.name: min_target_amount
docs: The minimum amount out required when swapping

fields.name: expiration
docs: The timestamp when this close position request expires.

fields.name: interest
docs: The amount of interest the user must pay

fields.name: execution_fee
docs: The amount of the execution fee to be paid

types.name: ClosePositionRequest
docs: An account that is used to cache data between the open position setup and cleanup instructions.

fields.name: statuses
docs: Bit mapping of enabled features. Status allow disabling trading, lping, etc.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the LpVault's PDA

fields.name: asset
docs: The SPL Mint address of the token that sits in this vault

fields.name: vault
docs: The SPL Token account that stores the unborrowed tokens

fields.name: shares_mint
docs: The SPL Mint address that represents shares in the vault

fields.name: total_assets
docs: Count of the total assets owned by the vault, including tokens that are currently borrowed

fields.name: max_borrow
docs: Maximum amount that can be borrowed by admin

fields.name: total_borrowed
docs: Total amount currently borrowed from the vault that is to be paid back by the admin

fields.name: nonce
docs: The nonce of the Position

fields.name: min_target_amount
docs: The minimum amount out required when swapping

fields.name: down_payment
docs: The initial down payment amount required to open the position (is in `currency` for long, `
collateralCurrency` for short positions)

fields.name: principal
docs: The total principal amount to be borrowed for the position.

fields.name: expiration
docs: The timestamp when this position request expires.

fields.name: fee
docs: The fee to be paid for the position

types.name: OpenPositionRequest
docs: An account that is used to cache data between the open position setup and cleanup instructions.

fields.name: nonce
docs: The nonce of the Position

fields.name: min_target_amount
docs: The minimum amount out required when swapping

fields.name: down_payment
docs: The initial down payment amount required to open the position (is in `currency` for long, `collateralCurrency` for short positions)

fields.name: principal
docs: The total principal amount to be borrowed for the position.

fields.name: expiration
docs: The timestamp when this position request expires.

fields.name: fee
docs: The fee to be paid for the position

fields.name: authority
docs: The key that is given these permissions

fields.name: trader
docs: Wallet that opened the position

fields.name: currency
docs: The address of the currency to be paid for the position.

fields.name: collateral
docs: The address of the currency to be received for the position.

fields.name: last_funding_timestamp
docs: The timestamp of the last funding payment.

fields.name: down_payment
docs: The initial down payment amount required to open the position (is in `currency` for long, `collateralCurrency` for short positions)
i.e. It is always in the quote currency

fields.name: principal
docs: The total principal amount to be borrowed for the position (is in `currency`)

fields.name: collateral_amount
docs: The total collateral amount to be received for the position (is in `collateralCurrency`)

fields.name: fees_to_be_paid
docs: The total fees to be paid for the position (is in `currency`)

fields.name: collateral_vault
docs: Link to the token account that is holding the collateral

fields.name: position
docs: Position this Stop Loss Order corresponds to

fields.name: maker_amount
docs: The amount that will be sold from the position (is in `position.collateral_currency`)

fields.name: taker_amount
docs: The amount that will be bought to close the position (is in `position.currency`)

fields.name: position
docs: Position this Take Profit Order corresponds to

fields.name: maker_amount
docs: The amount that will be sold from the position (is in `position.collateral_currency`)

fields.name: taker_amount
docs: The amount that will be bought to close the position (is in `position.currency`)
